meanings.definition: A group of three people engaging in sexual activity together.
meanings.sent1: Last night, they decided to have a threesome for the first time.
meanings.sent2: The movie depicted a scandalous threesome between the characters.
meanings.sent3: The misunderstanding led to an accidental threesome invitation.
meanings.sent4: Their relationship was like a delicate balance in a threesome dance.
meanings.sent5: The idea of a threesome made him blush furiously.

meanings.definition: A group of three people or things.
meanings.sent1: The trio formed a talented threesome in the music industry.
meanings.sent2: The threesome of friends always stuck together through thick and thin.
meanings.sent3: The three puppies made an adorable threesome in the park.
meanings.sent4: The threesome of siblings shared a special bond that was unbreakable.
meanings.sent5: The threesome of colors created a beautiful painting on the canvas.

meanings.sent1: She suggested a threesome collaboration for the project.
meanings.sent2: The threesome handshake symbolized their unity.
meanings.sent3: The threesome competition brought out the best in each participant.
meanings.sent4: The threesome relationship required open communication and trust.
meanings.sent5: The threesome team worked seamlessly to achieve their goal.
